pullrequest.title: Polaris: rear differential, parameter updates for improved ground contact

content.raw: The asphalt road is slightly raised above the grass plane. In my testing I managed to get stuck with one of the rear wheels off the ground spinning. So I added all-wheel-drive in the gazebo_models pull request and a rear differential in this one. A front differential would be more completed due to steering geometry, but the rear differential could be done with a joint with erp=0 and some cfm damping.
content.html: The asphalt road is slightly raised above the grass plane. In my testing I managed to get stuck with one of the rear wheels off the ground spinning. So I added all-wheel-drive in the gazebo_models pull request and a rear differential in this one. A front differential would be more completed due to steering geometry, but the rear differential could be done with a joint with erp=0 and some cfm damping.
